title: Installation issue: slepc
body:
Our spack environment, based on E4S, picked up the latest version (`3.14.1`) of `slepc` with #20291.  This version did not build on ubuntu linux with `gcc@7.5.0`.  The concrete spec yaml file I attempted to install (attached) has all the specifics of the failed spec, but to summarize it was: `slepc@3.14.1 %gcc@7.5.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 /2m5avzr`.

Here's a summary from the error log:

```
/home/software/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_pa/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.5.0/python-3.8.6-szj7jukzoj34lkchuvzrzbh52kgesac7/bin/python3.8 /home/software/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_pa/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.5.0/petsc-3.14.1-dtldv5gbkfwz3672gw5uonhtexncgojo/share/petsc/examples/config/gmakegen.py --petsc-arch= --pkg-dir=/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-slepc-3.14.1-2m5avzreoqsbe57hcwryejaygpqssgae/spack-src --pkg-name=slepc --pkg-pkgs=sys,eps,svd,pep,nep,mfn,lme --pkg-arch=installed-arch-linux2-c-opt
gmakefile:72: recipe for target 'installed-arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/slepc/conf/files' failed
make[3]: *** [installed-arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/slepc/conf/files] Error 127
make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-slepc-3.14.1-2m5avzreoqsbe57hcwryejaygpqssgae/spack-src/lib/slepc/conf/slepc_rules:121: recipe for target 'slepc_libs' failed
make[2]: *** [slepc_libs] Error 2
[1;31m*******************************ERROR************************************
  Error during compile, check installed-arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/slepc/conf/make.log
```

### Information on your system

Output of `spack debug report`:

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-202-9bcf99358
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-haswell
* **Concretizer:** original
```

The build failure happened inside of the following spack environment:

[spack.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673905/spack.yaml.txt)

The concrete `spec.yaml` I attempted to install:

[slepc.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673981/slepc.yaml.txt)

### Additional information

Spack build logs:

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673918/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673919/spack-build-out.txt)

Other logs mentioned in the build log error messages (contents of `installed-arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/slepc/conf`) are attached below.

[slepcvariables.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673946/slepcvariables.txt)
[slepcrules.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673947/slepcrules.txt)
[make.log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673948/make.log.txt)
files.txt [empty]
[error.log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673956/error.log.txt)
[configure.log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673957/configure.log.txt)
[modules/slepc/3.14.1.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5673966/3.14.1.txt)

Mentioning the maintainers of `slepc`:

@balay @joseeroman

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
